attributes.additional_details:
British court rules extradition of 48-year-old Tobias Bowen would breach human rights because he faces an "indefinite" sentence if convicted of sex crimes in New York

Why do we harbour possible criminals, sexual predators and terrorists. This man and his family should be extradited to the United States to face a trial, an innocent man wouldn't run anyway.

If he is convicted then jail is where he belongs not on our streets possibly endangering our children
